homePage.companyDescription: A company specialized in selling clothing and beauty products, offering the latest trends at competitive prices. The company is headquartered in Baghdad and is committed to providing high quality products and excellent customer service.
homePage.aboutUsContent: We are a company specialized in clothing and cosmetics trading, headquartered in Baghdad. We offer a wide range of the latest fashion and personal care products, committed to providing high quality products at competitive prices to meet the needs of all our customers. We always strive to provide a distinctive shopping experience and exceptional customer service to ensure your satisfaction and trust.
homePage.contactUsContent: Feel free to send us a message

footer.companyName: Beirut Road Trading Company - Limited Liability.
footer.rights: 2024 Beirut Road Trading Company - Limited Liability. All Rights Reserved.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: We are Al-Bara’a Law Office, a legal firm specializing in providing legal consultations and defense in criminal, commercial, and civil cases. The founder of the office has over twenty-five years of experience in the judiciary and legal practice, with a proven track record of delivering justice fairly at all stages of trials and legal proceedings.

ourServices.1: Legal Consultations in various fields such as criminal law, family law, and commercial law.
ourServices.2: Legal Representation for clients in civil, commercial, and criminal courts.
ourServices.3: Legal Research and case analysis, along with the preparation of advanced legal strategies.

ourGoals.1: Ensure justice and protect the legal rights of our clients.
ourGoals.2: Provide specialized legal advice in accordance with the latest laws and regulations.
ourGoals.3: Enhance the level of excellence and professionalism in delivering legal services.

aboutUs.historyContent: Al-Bara’a Law Office was established in 2024, backed by a strong educational and practical background. The founder holds a Master's degree in Private Law from Azad University of Isfahan in Iran and a diploma in Judicial Sciences from the Judicial Institute in Baghdad. He has held various judicial positions, including:

historyList.1: JJudge of the Family Court in Sadr City.
historyList.2: Judge of the Commercial Court in Basra.
historyList.3: Responsible for developing investigation procedures in cases of corruption and immigration.
